wikipedia_page.main: Gerwyn Rhys Morgan (9 June 1954 – August 2021) was a Wales international rugby union player. He played his club rugby for Newport and captained the team during the 1987–88 season.

response: Rhys Morgan may also refer to:
*Rice Morgan, MP, also spelt Rhys Morgan
*Rhys Morgan, 67, Welsh rugby union player (national team).Obituary: Newport stalwart Rhys Morgan dies
